data.description: Load, create, manipulate, save pbm files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module implements pbm (portable bitmap) specific load() and
    save() methods for the Image::Base interface (using Image::Xbm and
    Image::PBMlib). Thus it's similar to Image::Xpm and Image::Xbm.
